attacks.name: Bind
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Vengeful Spikes
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Omanyte, Omastar, Kabuto, Kabutops, and Kabutops ex in your discard pile. You can't add more than 60 damage in this way.
